name: dart-barrel-file-generator
description: Visual studio code to generate barrel files for the Dart language.

commands.title: GDBF: Current folder and nested folders

dartBarrelFileGenerator.defaultBarrelNam.title: Default barrel file name
dartBarrelFileGenerator.defaultBarrelNam.markdownDescription: The default name for the barrel file is `<folder-name>.dart`. You can override this name by setting a custom name. If there's any whitespace in the name it will be replaced by a '-' and the name **will be transformed to lowercase**.

dartBarrelFileGenerator.promptName.title: Open input on file generation
dartBarrelFileGenerator.promptName.description: Get promted asking for the name of the barrel file that will be created

dartBarrelFileGenerator.excludeFileList.title: Additional patterns to exclude files
dartBarrelFileGenerator.excludeFileList.description: Add the file patterns that you want to exclude (as glob patterns). Excluded files will not be added to the barrel file.

dartBarrelFileGenerator.excludeDirList.title: Additional patterns to exclude directories
dartBarrelFileGenerator.excludeDirList.description: Add the directory patterns that you want to exclude (as glob patterns). A barrel file will not be generated for these directories.

dartBarrelFileGenerator.prependFolderNam.title: Prepend name of the folder to the generated file
dartBarrelFileGenerator.prependFolderNam.markdownDescription: Prepend the name of the folder to the generated files, e.g.: `<folder-name>_<barrel-file>.dart`.

dartBarrelFileGenerator.appendFolderName.title: Append name of the folder to the generated file
dartBarrelFileGenerator.appendFolderName.markdownDescription: Append the name of the folder to the generated files, e.g.: `<barrel-file>_<folder-name>.dart`.

dartBarrelFileGenerator.skipEmpty.title: Skip empty folders
dartBarrelFileGenerator.skipEmpty.description: Skip generating barrel files for folders that are empty (or do not contain any valid dart file)
